level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-85, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-301.01.
For history of Law 18-371, see notes under § 2-301.01.

level.heading: Editor's notes
level.text: Pursuant to § 101(ff) of D.C. Law 11-259, which enacted Subpart B. [Part B, 2001 Ed.] of this subchapter, consisting of §§ 1-1188.7 through 1-1188.12 [§§ 2-308.07 through 2-308.12, 2001 Ed.], the preexisting provisions of this subchapter were designated as Subpart A [Part A, 2001 Ed.].
